data.name: Fantasy Grounds - NPCs: The Poor (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
NPCs: The Poor


This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains non player characters of low standing found in a typical town.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 2 Female Barmaids
  • 2 Female and one Male Beggar
  • Male and Female Elderly
  • Male and Female Farmer
  • Female Message Bearer
  • Female Poor Carrier
  • Female Poor Cloaked
  • Female Poor Dog Sitter
  • Female Poor Net Mender
  • Female Poor Shepherd
  • 2 Female Poor Sleeping
  • Female Poor Washer
  • Female Poster Maker
  • Female Sitting Beggar
  • Female Sitting Washer
  • Male Baker
  • Male Cook
  • Male Digger
  • 3 Male Dock Workers
  • 2 Male Fishers
  • Male Foreman
  • Male Hauler
  • Male Miner
  • 2 Male Poor Merchant2
  • 2 Male Poor Sleeing
  • Male Sitting
  • Male Sitting Beggar
  • 2 Male Travelers
  • 2 Male Woodchopper
  • Token Info Card

Released on March 26, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
